entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 15 TO 20 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF FLURRIES AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 40
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 40

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
